name: Sneordra
domains: Goddess of Ice, Snow, and Winter
worshippers: Yetis, Ice Mephits, those in cold climates often make offerings to request a gentle winter
weapon: A scepter made of an icicle
appearance: A tall, white skinned, curvaceous woman with hair the color of icicles and a crystalline dress.
tenets: Your desires are the enemy of your goals
A coldly logical mind is your best tool
Snow and ice can both protect and destroy, when used correctly
holiday: The Snow Celebration, typically held on Neradan 20 in the northern hemisphere.
parents: 3rd Generation, born of Trimala and Area
lore: The followers of Sneordra have a unique method of divining, reading messages from Sneordra in the patterns frost makes on things such as glass or the surfaces of ponds. Priests of Sneordra typically take a vow of chastity, puting aside their earthly desires.
